server.controller

Class ConnectionRMI

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.controller.ConnectionRMI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RMIClientInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, Connection

    public class ConnectionRMI
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connection, java.io.Serializable
    This class communicates with RMIClient using RMIClientInterface
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • statusKingBoard

        public void statusKingBoard(java.lang.String[][] councilBalconyName,
                            java.awt.Color[][] councilBalconyColor,
                            int[] kingReward,
                            java.lang.String[][] bonusReward,
                            java.lang.String[] councillorNameOutOfBalcony,
                            java.awt.Color[] councillorColorOutOfBalcony)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Specified by:
        statusKingBoard in interface RMIClientInterface
        Parameters:
        councilBalconyName - in every row there are the names of the color that have the councillors in any balcony (row->balcony, column->councillor)
        councilBalconyColor - like councilBalconyName but in this array the color is in the Color type, not string
        kingReward - list of king reward available
        bonusReward - list of bonus available and in which town you must build to take them
        councillorNameOutOfBalcony - list of the councillor out of balcony, the name of their color
        councillorColorOutOfBalcony - like councillorNameOutOfBalcony but this array is Color type
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • statusNobilityRoad

        public void statusNobilityRoad(int[][] bonusNobilityRoad)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Specified by:
        statusNobilityRoad in interface RMIClientInterface
        Parameters:
        bonusNobilityRoad - every row is a step of nobility road and in the columns there are the bonus for every step [money, helper, politicalcard, nobility, scorepoint, mainaction, permitcardbonus, permitcard, bonustown]
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • statusOpponents

        public void statusOpponents(java.lang.String[][] statusOpponent,
                            java.awt.Color[] colorOpponent)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Specified by:
        statusOpponents in interface RMIClientInterface
        Parameters:
        statusOpponent - every row is an opponent and in the columns there are the different resources that have the opponent [money, helper, scorePoint, nobility, how many permit cards has, how many politic cards has, how many emporium not used has]
        colorOpponent - Color of the opponent
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        c - Color of the player
        politicalCards - list of the political card that the player has (the name of the card color)

      • receiveOtherOfferts

        public void receiveOtherOfferts(java.lang.String[][] offerts,
                                int timeBuy)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Specified by:
        receiveOtherOfferts in interface RMIClientInterface
        Parameters:
        offerts - every row is an offer [name of opponent, firstNumber, secondNumber, thirdNumber] firstNumber: 0-permit card, 1-political card, 2-helper secondNumber: which permit card/political card or how much helper you want to sell thirdNumber: how much money do you want for your offer
        timeBuy - how much time the player has to buy something
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
